name: Mushroom Night's Lights
description:
Mushroom Night's Lights is a 3d platformer, in a dark cave, populated with mushrooms and other environmental elements, these seem to have lost their magic, or vital energy ... Give them back as soon as possible!

This game is speedrunable!

Best time: 1:03.53
Video link: https://youtu.be/yK7JjHB2h0g

Control:
- Directional arrows & AZERTY & QWERTY: displacement
- Space bar: Jump (Double jump allowed)
- Mouse: Camera control
- Escape: Menu / Pause

Game developed in less than 30 hours for Jam!
